name: The Sword (Ephy)
description:
You're the Hero. And you must found the Sword of Hopes and Dreams to defeat the Monster King and free the Humankind. But it won't be and easy task, even for you. 

It's a short game made for the "Make a game in 1 hour" jam: https://itch.io/jam/rpgmaker1hour. It's really short and more a concept than an actual complete game. But it fit the rules.

--------------------------------------------

The Sword-1H_Jam.zip is the true original Jam entry. RGSS standard RPG MakerVX ressources are not included and must be installed to play the game. 

The Sword-1H_Jam.zip is the original Jam entry. RGSS standard RPG MakerVX ressources were included later, after the Jam end. It's still the same game, but just a bit more user friendly.

The Sword-Finale.zip (RGSS not included) is the final version of the game. RGSS standard RPG MakerVX ressources are not included and are not needed. Game file is slightly lighter but it may have unexpected missing ressources causing crash on certain rare conditions.

The Sword_RGSS-Finale (RGSS included).zip is the final version of the game. RGSS standard RPG MakerVX ressources are included. Game file is slightly heavier but no crash due to missing RGSS ressources may occur
